channel.title: rbethlehem on Laboratory of Autism and Neurodevelopmental Disorders (LAND)
channel.description: Recent content in rbethlehem on Laboratory of Autism and Neurodevelopmental Disorders (LAND)

item.description: Dr Bethlehem holds a British Academy Postdoctoral Fellowship in the Department of Psychiatry at the University of Cambridge. He works in collaboration with the Autism Research Centre in Cambridge and the Geschwind lab at UCLA, integrating neuroimaging and transcriptomics data to better understand the genetic underpinnings of atypical neurodevelopment.
